S.FORM: Bob Boozer sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1937 , ryax sa tay 26 nqu tay 4, Bob Boozer, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 2012) qnxan nya Bob Boozer m'rkyas ru htagan beh sa Omaha, Nebraska. Bob Boozer tmasot pqwasan biru gocyu mnaki Omaha. hiya rangi' Bob Gibson,raral ga mqwas biru beh Kansas hopa pqwasan biru.kawas tay 1958, hiya ga wal ku qragan mnwah Wildcats. kawas tay 1960 hoqan abaw lga, Boozer ru Royals Oscar Robertson. Bob Boozer tmasot qyanux na bincyogun lga musa Omaha,praw mrhuw maki Bell Systems. kawas tay 2020,ryax sa tay 19 nqu tay 5,wal mhuqil la.
